messages.title: FIGHTING TO GET THE NHS WE DESERVE IN WELWYN HATFIELD
messages.content: Ever since New Labour stole our new super-hospital and sent it to Stevenage, Grant has been fighting the system to return healthcare to Welwyn Hatfield.

messages.title: A personal message from Grant Shapps
messages.content: I am standing for re-election as your Member of Parliament, as I think I can offer Welwyn Hatfield even more over the coming years.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaign for the return of a proper A&E to Welwyn Hatfield.
Supports many community groups to prosper in our area.
Will work to make sure the Galleria prospers.
Argue for our communities to gain full rights where house-building takes place.

issues.economy: Will work to make sure the Galleria prospers.
issues.health: Campaign for the return of a proper A&E to Welwyn Hatfield.

community.content: Supports many community groups to prosper in our area.
Argue for our communities to gain full rights where house-building takes place.

leaflet.personalStatement: Welwyn Hatfield is my home and I care deeply about it. I am proud to have served as its MP. I live here and am bringing up my children here. That means that I have a real stake in making our shared community better. I hope that, with your support, I can carry on serving our community.

endorsements.endorsement: Grant is always on hand to help local people, even if he’s in Westminster fighting our corner most of the week, he still makes time to speak to those who need his help.
I often see Grant out and about in Hatfield and the wider constituency. I think it’s great that he is so approachable. I know that if I ever need help from him, he is only a call or email away!

images.caption: Grant wants improvements to the QEII

examples: Ever since New Labour stole our new super-hospital and sent it to Stevenage, Grant has been fighting the system to return healthcare to Welwyn Hatfield.
I am standing for re-election as your Member of Parliament, as I think I can offer Welwyn Hatfield even more over the coming years.

Welwyn Hatfield is my home and I care deeply about it. I am proud to have served as its MP. I live here and am bringing up my children here. That means that I have a real stake in making our shared community better. I hope that, with your support, I can carry on serving our community.
Grant is always on hand to help local people, even if he’s in Westminster fighting our corner most of the week, he still makes time to speak to those who need his help.
I often see Grant out and about in Hatfield and the wider constituency. I think it’s great that he is so approachable. I know that if I ever need help from him, he is only a call or email away!
Campaign for the return of a proper A&E to Welwyn Hatfield.
Supports many community groups to prosper in our area.
Will work to make sure the Galleria prospers.
Argue for our communities to gain full rights where house-building takes place.
I can offer Welwyn Hatfield even more over the coming years.
Clearly we can’t afford to risk Jeremy Corbyn’s chaotic hand on the tiller at this crucial time for our nation.
Grant is always on hand to help local people, even if he’s in Westminster fighting our corner most of the week, he still makes time to speak to those who need his help.
I often see Grant out and about in Hatfield and the wider constituency. I think it’s great that he is so approachable. I know that if I ever need help from him, he is only a call or email away!
Ever since New Labour stole our new super-hospital and sent it to Stevenage...
Clearly we can’t afford to risk Jeremy Corbyn’s chaotic hand on the tiller at this crucial time for our nation.
